name: .FSPRO
summary: Learn about .FSPRO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an FSPRO file, and the project to which it points, with FMOD Studio. To do so, select File â†’ Open... from FMOD Studio's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your FSPRO file. Note that, in order for FMOD Studio to open your project correctly, the project's FSPRO file must be stored within the project's top-level directory.
